title: TheMGuy
author: TheMGuy
content: Hello, we are new to bitcointalk so I hope we do not break any rules. We sell gambling verified accounts. Any websites, any countries. Prices differ on each website.Telegram : @moneyRproblems

comments.author: Why2why
comments.body: Buying and selling of accounts is not allowed in this forum,  since such bought accounts paused the potential risk of being used to scam or abuse the casino at any point in time Why will anyone want to buy a verified account any ways when you can easily open yours and operate it possibly go through verification if need be?

comments.author: marbet85
comments.body: Quote from: Why2why on September 20, 2023, 09:46:34 PMBuying and selling of accounts is not allowed in this forum,  since such bought accounts paused the potential risk of being used to scam or abuse the casino at any point in time Why will anyone want to buy a verified account any ways when you can easily open yours and operate it possibly go through verification if need be? Of course, it's risky and you can "meet" here scammer and you don't know from seller had data also "owner of account" can't agree of used his data.But people sell everything that people want to buy.A few things why people buy:Firstly and most importantly: LIMITS, if you're a good bettor, you play surebets, tipsters and, in short, you are in + on the bookmaker they give to you limits per bet like 1EUR, Bet365 and others. If you're good, they can give you this funny limits after few bets. Second: It's not possible to register in your country, so you're looking for an account in a country where it is possible.3rd: You don't want show your data to your country system about tax etc.But of course all depends on your inner feeling.
